attributes.action: Stop the publication of "Real Life Bugs" magazine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This publication features a dead animal as a gift on each issue.
It is deplorable that the animals are farmed and killed in their thousands for the profit of magazine companies. 
I urge people to sign this petition to halt further publication of this magazine.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
